message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not being generous yet!
I'll give you a bit more, but you still need to compromise
You're not getting away with a lowball offer! I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm still in the driver's seat!
I'm not going to give you a free pass, Bob! It's time to make a fairer split

This is my final offer, Bob! I'm not going to give up without a fight!
